parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

title: IView.IGetVisibleEntities
signature:
Entity IGetVisibleEntities( 
   Component2
LpViewComponent
,
   System.Int32
EntityType
,
   System.Int32
ViewEntityCount
)

parameters.name: LpViewComponent
parameters.description: Component from which to get EntityType

parameters.name: EntityType
parameters.description: Type of entity as defined in swViewEntityType_e

returns: Array of the specified visible entities
remarks:
Visible entities are only those entities not completely obscured by other entities in the view.
Call
IView::GetVisibleEntityCount
before calling this method to get the value of ViewEntityCount.
